entity.name: user
entity.query: select user_id as id,user_name,realname from users

entity.name: skills_data
entity.query: select skill_keyword_name as skill_keyword from skill_keywords sk, user_skills_keywords_join uskj, user_skills us where sk.skill_keyword_id = uskj.skill_keyword_id and uskj.user_skill_id = us.user_skill_id and us.user_id = '${user.id}'
